game.name: TS Marketplace: RO Calatori B 26-26 Coach Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This coach pack recreates a class of double-decker train cars owned by the Romanian national operator CFR, built in Germany at Waggonbau Görlitz factory and in Romania at Intreprinderea de Vagoane Arad.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This coach pack recreates a class of double-decker train cars owned by the Romanian national operator CFR, built in Germany at Waggonbau Görlitz factory and in Romania at Intreprinderea de Vagoane Arad.
